sentence: If  you're  just  joining  us  or  need  a  recap,  here's  a  quick  round  up  of  the  latest  developments:  The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  has  said  more  than  20,000  people  have  been  killed  in  the  territory  since  7  October  -  when  Israel  began  its  retaliatory  operation  in  response  to  the  Hamas  attacks  on  Israel.
Families  of  people  killed  and  taken  hostage  from  Kibbutz  Be’eri  in  the  Hamas  attacks  say  their  home  was  “turned  into  hell”  by  the  brutality  of  7  October.
